member.name: M:Tassle.Logging.Telnet.TelnetLoggerFactoryExtensions.AddTelnet(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory,System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Adds a telnet logger that is enabled for .Information or higher.

member.summary: Adds a telnet logger that is enabled for .Information or higher.
member.param: A value which indicates whether log scope information should be displayed in the output.
